course_description:
A study of literary works of various genres and other imaginative writing about the relation of humans to the non-human world. Approaches may focus on particular genres, periods, or themes (e.g.,ecofiction, ecopoetry, literature of climate change, multispecies
 writing, animal ethics, etc.).
